00066 #if defined(PIC_ADC_HCVD_AVAILABLE)
00067 
00068 #define ADC10BIT_HALF_VDD       512
00069 #define ADC10BIT_5PERCENT       50
00070 
00071 #asm
00072     #ifndef MTOUCH_ACQ_CAS_INCLUDE
00073     #define MTOUCH_ACQ_CAS_INCLUDE
00074         #if defined(_12F617) && (_HTC_VER_MAJOR_ == 9 && _HTC_VER_MINOR_ == 80)
00075             #include <cas12F617.h>      // HiTech's 9.80 compiler's caspic.h includes the 617 header file twice, causing compiling 
00076                                         // errors. This will by-pass the mistake by directly including the correct file only once.
00077                                         // This issue has been fixed as of the 9.81 release.
00078         #elif (_HTC_VER_MAJOR_ == 9 && _HTC_VER_MINOR_ >= 83)
00079             #if defined(_PIC14) || defined(_PIC14E)
00080             #include <caspic.h>
00081             #endif
00082         #endif
00083     #endif
00084 #endasm

00091   mTouch_AcquisitionData        mTouch_acqData      [MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS];  
00092   mTouch_AcquisitionData*       mTouch_currentAcqData;  
00093                 uint16_t        mTouch_sensorData   [MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS];    
00094                 uint16_t        mTouch_lastResult;                                      
00095                 uint8_t         mTouch_delayCount;                                      
00096 
00097 #if (MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS > 1)
00098     #if (MTOUCH_NUM_MODES > 1)
00099                 uint8_t         mTouch_modeIndex; 
00100           const uint8_t*        mTouch_currentScan;
00101     #else
00102                 uint8_t         mTouch_currentScan;
00103     #endif

00106 #if defined(MTOUCH_UNIQUE_OVERSAMPLE_ENABLE) && (MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS > 1)

00134 // Constant Memory
00135 #if (MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS > 1)
00136     #if MTOUCH_NUM_MODES > 1
00137     const uint8_t           mTouch_mode0[MTOUCH_MODE0_NUM_SENSORS + 1]  = MTOUCH_MODE0_VAR_INIT;
00138     const uint8_t           mTouch_mode1[MTOUCH_MODE1_NUM_SENSORS + 1]  = MTOUCH_MODE1_VAR_INIT;
00139     #endif
00140     #if MTOUCH_NUM_MODES > 2
00141     const uint8_t           mTouch_mode2[MTOUCH_MODE2_NUM_SENSORS + 1]  = MTOUCH_MODE2_VAR_INIT;
00142     #endif
00143     #if MTOUCH_NUM_MODES > 3
00144     const uint8_t           mTouch_mode3[MTOUCH_MODE3_NUM_SENSORS + 1]  = MTOUCH_MODE3_VAR_INIT;
00145     #endif
00146     #if MTOUCH_NUM_MODES > 4
00147     const uint8_t           mTouch_mode4[MTOUCH_MODE4_NUM_SENSORS + 1]  = MTOUCH_MODE4_VAR_INIT;
00148     #endif
00149     #if MTOUCH_NUM_MODES > 5
00150     const uint8_t           mTouch_mode5[MTOUCH_MODE5_NUM_SENSORS + 1]  = MTOUCH_MODE5_VAR_INIT;
00151     #endif
00152     #if MTOUCH_NUM_MODES > 6
00153     const uint8_t           mTouch_mode6[MTOUCH_MODE6_NUM_SENSORS + 1]  = MTOUCH_MODE6_VAR_INIT;
00154     #endif
00155     #if MTOUCH_NUM_MODES > 7
00156     const uint8_t           mTouch_mode7[MTOUCH_MODE7_NUM_SENSORS + 1]  = MTOUCH_MODE7_VAR_INIT;
00157     #endif
00158     #if MTOUCH_NUM_MODES > 1
00159     const uint8_t*    const mTouch_mode             [MTOUCH_NUM_MODES]  = MTOUCH_MODE_VAR_INIT;
00160     #endif
00161     
00162     #if defined(MTOUCH_UNIQUE_OVERSAMPLE_ENABLE) && (MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS > 1)
00163     const uint8_t   mTouch_Oversample_Default[MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS]  = MTOUCH_UNIQUE_OVERSAMPLE_INIT;
00164     #endif
00165     
00166     const uint8_t   mTouch_Sensor_Channel[MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS] = MTOUCH_SENSOR_CHANNEL_INIT;

00180 #if (MTOUCH_INTEGRATION_TYPE == MTOUCH_CONTROLS_ISR)
00181 void interrupt  mTouch_Scan(void)
00182 #elif (MTOUCH_INTEGRATION_TYPE == MTOUCH_CALLED_FROM_ISR)
00183 void            mTouch_Scan(void)
00184 #elif (MTOUCH_INTEGRATION_TYPE == MTOUCH_CALLED_FROM_MAINLOOP)
00185 uint8_t         mTouch_Scan(void)
00186 #endif
00187 {
00188 #asm
00189 mTouch_Scan:
00190 #endasm 
00191        
00192     //
00193     // Intro Logic :: Check to see if we should scan.
00194     //
00195     #if     (MTOUCH_INTEGRATION_TYPE == MTOUCH_CONTROLS_ISR)
00196         if (MTOUCH_ISR_TMRxIF == 0) 
00197         {
00198             return;
00199         }                            
00200             
00201         MTOUCH_ISR_TMRxIF = 0; 
00202     #elif   (MTOUCH_INTEGRATION_TYPE == MTOUCH_CALLED_FROM_MAINLOOP)
00203         if (mTouch_state.scanningEnabled == 0)
00204         {
00205             return 0;
00206         }    
00207     #endif
00208     
00209     #if (MTOUCH_ADC_CONTROL == MTOUCH_RELEASES_ADC_AFTER_SCAN)
00210     mTouch_HCVD_Init();
00211     #endif
00212 
00213     #if defined(HCVD_ADDCAP_AUTOCAL_ENABLE)
00214     AADCAP = mTouch_HCVD_addCap[MTOUCH_CURRENTSCAN_VALUE];
00215     #endif
00216     
00217     #if (MTOUCH_SCAN_FUNCTIONALITY == MTOUCH_SCANS_ALL_SENSORS)
00218     do
00219     {
00220     #endif
00221     
00222         #if defined(MTOUCH_UNIQUE_OVERSAMPLE_ENABLE)
00223         if (mTouch_oversample[MTOUCH_CURRENTSCAN_VALUE] != 0)
00224         {
00225         #endif
00226         
00227             mTouch_currentAcqData   = &mTouch_acqData[MTOUCH_CURRENTSCAN_VALUE];
00228             
00229             //
00230             //  Scan
00231             //
00232             #if (MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS > 1)
00233             ADCON0  = mTouch_Sensor_Channel[MTOUCH_CURRENTSCAN_VALUE];
00234             #else
00235             ADCON0  = MTOUCH_SELECT_SENSOR0;
00236             #endif
00237             ADCON0bits.GO_nDONE = 1;
00238 
00239             //  Store Result of Scan
00240             mTouch_WaitForGoDone();
00241             
00242             #if defined(HCVD_ADDCAP_AUTOCAL_ENABLE)
00243             if (mTouch_stateVars.sensor[MTOUCH_CURRENTSCAN_VALUE].state == MTOUCH_INITIALIZING)
00244             {
00245                 if (AADRES0 > ADC10BIT_HALF_VDD)
00246                 {
00247                     // The external capacitor is smaller than the internal ADC capacitance. Try
00248                     // to reduce the size of the internal ADC capacitance, if possible.
00249                     if (mTouch_HCVD_addCap[MTOUCH_CURRENTSCAN_VALUE] > 0)
00250                         mTouch_HCVD_addCap[MTOUCH_CURRENTSCAN_VALUE]--;
00251                 }
00252                 else if (AADRES0 < ADC10BIT_HALF_VDD)
00253                 {
00254                     // The external capacitor is larger than the internal ADC capacitance. Try
00255                     // to increase the size of the internal capacitance, if possible.
00256                     if (mTouch_HCVD_addCap[MTOUCH_CURRENTSCAN_VALUE] < PIC_ADC_HCVD_ADDCAP_MAX)
00257                         mTouch_HCVD_addCap[MTOUCH_CURRENTSCAN_VALUE]++;
00258                 }
00259             }
00260             #endif
00261             
00262             mTouch_StoreScan();
00263             
00264             //
00265             //  Math
00266             //
00267             mTouch_DecimationFilter();
00268         
00269         #if defined(MTOUCH_UNIQUE_OVERSAMPLE_ENABLE)
00270             mTouch_oversample[MTOUCH_CURRENTSCAN_VALUE]--;
00271         }
00272         #endif
00273         
00274     
00275     #if MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS > 1
00276         mTouch_currentScan++;
00277     #if (MTOUCH_SCAN_FUNCTIONALITY == MTOUCH_SCANS_ALL_SENSORS)
00278     } while (MTOUCH_CURRENTSCAN_VALUE != MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS);
00279     #else
00280     if  (MTOUCH_CURRENTSCAN_VALUE == MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS)
00281     {
00282     #endif
00283     
00284         #if MTOUCH_NUM_MODES > 1
00285         mTouch_currentScan      = mTouch_mode[mTouch_modeIndex];
00286         #else
00287         mTouch_currentScan      = 0;
00288         #endif
00289     #endif  //  end: if (MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS > 1)
00290     
00291         #if defined(MTOUCH_UNIQUE_OVERSAMPLE_ENABLE) && (MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS > 1)
00292         mTouch_delayCount = 0;      // Used as a temporary flag variable
00293         do
00294         {
00295         
00296             if (mTouch_oversample[MTOUCH_CURRENTSCAN_VALUE])    // Are there any sensors left to be scanned?
00297                 mTouch_delayCount++;
00298                 
00299             mTouch_currentScan++;   
00300             
00301         } while (MTOUCH_CURRENTSCAN_VALUE != MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS);
00302         
00303             #if MTOUCH_NUM_MODES > 1
00304             mTouch_currentScan      = mTouch_mode[mTouch_modeIndex];
00305             #else
00306             mTouch_currentScan      = 0;
00307             #endif
00308         
00309         if (mTouch_delayCount == 0)
00310         {
00311         #else
00312         if (--mTouch_stateVars.sampleCounter == 0)
00313         {
00314             mTouch_stateVars.sampleCounter   = MTOUCH_SpS_VALUE; 
00315         #endif
00316 
00317             #if (MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS > 1)
00318             do 
00319             {
00320                 mTouch_currentAcqData = &mTouch_acqData[MTOUCH_CURRENTSCAN_VALUE];
00321                 mTouch_sensorData[MTOUCH_CURRENTSCAN_VALUE] = (uint16_t)(((uint24_t)((*mTouch_currentAcqData).accumulator.v) & 0xFFFFF) >> MTOUCH_SCALING_VALUE);
00322                 (*mTouch_currentAcqData).accumulator.v &= 0xF00000;
00323                 
00324                 mTouch_currentScan++;    
00325             } while (MTOUCH_CURRENTSCAN_VALUE != MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS);
00326             #else
00327                 mTouch_sensorData[MTOUCH_CURRENTSCAN_VALUE] = (uint16_t)(((uint24_t)(mTouch_acqData[0].accumulator.v) & 0xFFFFF) >> MTOUCH_SCALING_VALUE);
00328                 mTouch_acqData[0].accumulator.v &= 0xF00000;
00329             #endif
00330             
00331             #if MTOUCH_NUM_MODES > 1
00332             mTouch_ChangeMode(mTouch_modeIndex);
00333             #else
00334             mTouch_ChangeMode();
00335             #endif
00336             mTouch_state.dataReady  = 1;
00337         }
00338     
00339     #if MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS > 1
00340     #if (MTOUCH_SCAN_FUNCTIONALITY != MTOUCH_SCANS_ALL_SENSORS)
00341     }
00342     #endif
00343     #endif
00344         
00345     #if defined(MTOUCH_EEPROM_ENABLE) 
00346     if (MTOUCH_JITTER_VALUE != 0)
00347     {
00348     #endif
00349     
00350         #if defined(MTOUCH_EEPROM_ENABLE) || defined(MTOUCH_JITTER_ENABLE)
00351             #if (MTOUCH_INTEGRATION_TYPE == MTOUCH_CALLED_FROM_MAINLOOP)
00352                 JITTER_MAIN_LOOP(); 
00353             #else
00354                 JITTER_START_TIME(); 
00355             #endif
00356         #endif
00357         
00358     #if defined(MTOUCH_EEPROM_ENABLE)
00359     }
00360     #endif
00361     
00362     #if (MTOUCH_INTEGRATION_TYPE == MTOUCH_CONTROLS_ISR) || (MTOUCH_INTEGRATION_TYPE == MTOUCH_CALLED_FROM_ISR)
00363     MTOUCH_ISR_TMRxIF = 0;          // Clear TMRxIF to avoid immediate ISR re-entry upon leaving.        
00364     #endif        
00365     
00366     #if (MTOUCH_INTEGRATION_TYPE == MTOUCH_CONTROLS_ISR) || (MTOUCH_INTEGRATION_TYPE == MTOUCH_CALLED_FROM_ISR)
00367         return;
00368     #elif (MTOUCH_INTEGRATION_TYPE == MTOUCH_CALLED_FROM_MAINLOOP)
00369         return mTouch_state.dataReady;
00370     #endif
00371 }
00372 
00373 void mTouch_DecimationFilter(void)
00374 {
00375     // Get the current decimated filter value for the sensor.
00376     #if MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS > 1
00377     uint16_t    result  = (uint16_t)((*mTouch_currentAcqData).result.v >> 4);
00378     #else
00379     uint16_t    result  = (uint16_t)(mTouch_acqData[0].result.v >> 4);
00380     #endif
00381     
00382     #if defined(MTOUCH_EEPROM_ENABLED)
00383         #if MTOUCH_DECIMATION_MAX_STEP > 255
00384         uint16_t    decMaxStep  = MTOUCH_DECIMATION_MAX_VALUE;
00385         #else
00386         uint8_t     decMaxStep  = MTOUCH_DECIMATION_MAX_VALUE;
00387         #endif
00388         
00389         #undef MTOUCH_DECIMATION_MAX_VALUE
00390         #define MTOUCH_DECIMATION_MAX_VALUE decMaxStep      // Replace the EEPROM access code with our temporary variable
00391     #endif
00392 
00393     #if defined(MTOUCH_DECIMATION_MAX_STEP) || defined(MTOUCH_EEPROM_ENABLED)
00394         #if (MTOUCH_DECIMATION_MAX_STEP != 0) || defined(MTOUCH_EEPROM_ENABLED)
00395             if ((uint16_t)(mTouch_lastResult) > (uint16_t)(result + MTOUCH_DECIMATION_MAX_VALUE))
00396             {                                                                                           
00397                 result += MTOUCH_DECIMATION_MAX_VALUE;      // Latest conversion is very large. Increment by max step size only.
00398             }                                                                         
00399             else if (result > MTOUCH_DECIMATION_MAX_VALUE)                                     
00400             {                                                                               
00401                 if ((uint16_t)(mTouch_lastResult) < result - MTOUCH_DECIMATION_MAX_VALUE)  
00402                 {                                                                           
00403                     result -= MTOUCH_DECIMATION_MAX_VALUE;  // Latest conversion is very small. Decrement by max step size only.
00404                 } else {          
00405                     result = mTouch_lastResult;             // Latest conversion is similar in value to decimated value.
00406                 }                                                                               
00407             }                                                                                   
00408             else                                            // Latest conversion is less than (decimated value + STEP_SIZE)
00409             {                                               // AND the decimated value is in danger of underflowing.                               
00410                 result = mTouch_lastResult; 
00411             } 
00412         #else                                           
00413             result = mTouch_lastResult;                     // Decimation disabled.
00414         #endif
00415     #else                                               
00416         result = mTouch_lastResult;                         // Decimation disabled.
00417     #endif
00418  
00419     #if MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS > 1
00420         (*mTouch_currentAcqData).result.v &= 0x000F;        // Store the new decimated value
00421         (*mTouch_currentAcqData).result.v |= (uint16_t)(result << 4);     
00422     #else
00423         mTouch_acqData[0].result.v &= 0x000F;               // Store the new decimated value
00424         mTouch_acqData[0].result.v |= (uint16_t)(result << 4);     
00425     #endif
00426     
00427     #if MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS > 1
00428     (*mTouch_currentAcqData).accumulator.v += (uint16_t)((*mTouch_currentAcqData).result.v >> 4);
00429     #else
00430     mTouch_acqData[0].accumulator.v += (uint16_t)(mTouch_acqData[0].result.v >> 4);
00431     #endif
00432 }
00433 
00434 void mTouch_WaitForGoDone(void)
00435 {
00436     mTouch_delayCount = 0xFF;  
00437     while (ADCON0bits.GO_nDONE && --mTouch_delayCount);  
00438 }
00439 
00440 void mTouch_StoreScan(void)
00441 {
00442     #if (PIC_ADC_BITS == 8)
00443     mTouch_lastResult = (0x0100 | AADRES1) - AADRES0;
00444     #elif (PIC_ADC_BITS == 10)
00445     mTouch_lastResult = (0x0400 | AADRES1) - AADRES0;
00446     #elif (PIC_ADC_BITS == 12)
00447     mTouch_lastResult = (0x1000 | AADRES1) - AADRES0;
00448     #else
00449     #error The PIC_ADC_BITS value in your device's hardware profile is invalid. It must be 8, 10, or 12.
00450     #endif
00451 }
00452 
00453 
00454 #if MTOUCH_NUM_MODES > 1
00455 void mTouch_ChangeMode(uint8_t newModeIndex)
00456 {
00457 #else
00458 void mTouch_ChangeMode(void)
00459 {
00460 #endif
00461     mTouch_currentAcqData   = 0;
00462     
00463     #if MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS > 1
00464     #if MTOUCH_NUM_MODES > 1
00465     mTouch_currentScan      = mTouch_mode[mTouch_modeIndex];
00466     
00467     if (mTouch_modeIndex != newModeIndex)
00468     {
00469         mTouch_modeIndex            = newModeIndex; 
00470         mTouch_state.justChanged    = 1;
00471     }
00472     #else   
00473     mTouch_currentScan      = 0;
00474     #endif
00475     #endif
00476     
00477     #if defined(MTOUCH_UNIQUE_OVERSAMPLE_ENABLE) && MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS > 1
00478     do
00479     {
00480         mTouch_oversample[MTOUCH_CURRENTSCAN_VALUE] = mTouch_Oversample_Default[MTOUCH_CURRENTSCAN_VALUE];    
00481         mTouch_currentScan++;   
00482     } while (MTOUCH_CURRENTSCAN_VALUE != MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS);
00483     
00484         #if MTOUCH_NUM_MODES > 1
00485         mTouch_currentScan      = mTouch_mode[mTouch_modeIndex];
00486         #else
00487         mTouch_currentScan      = 0;
00488         #endif
00489         
00490     #else
00491     mTouch_stateVars.sampleCounter   = MTOUCH_SpS_VALUE;
00492     #endif
00493 }
00494 
00495 void mTouch_HCVD_Init(void)
00496 {
00497     ADCON0bits.ADON     = 1;
00498     
00499     PIC_ADC_SETCLK();   
00500     PIC_ADC_ADFM = PIC_ADC_ADFM_RIGHT;
00501     
00502     AADCON2             = 0x00;         // Conversion Trigger   : None
00503     
00504     AADCON3bits.ADEPPOL = 0;            // Precharge, External  : Vss
00505     AADCON3bits.ADIPPOL = 1;            // Precharge, Internal  : Vdd
00506     AADCON3bits.ADDSEN  = 1;            // Conversion           : Double
00507     AADCON3bits.ADIPEN  = 1;            // Second Conversion    : Inverted
00508 
00509     #if defined(_16F1512) || defined(_16F1513)
00510     AADCON3bits.ADOLEN  = 0;            // No external connection to ADOUT (low impedance)
00511     #endif
00512     AADCON3bits.ADOEN   = 0;            // No external connection to ADOUT
00513     AADCON3bits.ADOOEN  = 0;            // ADOUT pin is not overwritten during precharge
00514     
00515     AADPRE              = HCVD_PRECHARGE_DELAY;     // Precharge timer
00516     AADACQ              = HCVD_SETTLING_DELAY;      // Acquisition timer
00517     
00518     #if defined(HCVD_GUARD_ENABLE)
00519     AADGRDbits.GRDAOE   = HCVD_GRDAOE_BITVALUE;     // Guard A              
00520     AADGRDbits.GRDBOE   = HCVD_GRDBOE_BITVALUE;     // Guard B              
00521     #else
00522     AADGRDbits.GRDAOE   = 0;                        // Guard A              : Disabled
00523     AADGRDbits.GRDBOE   = 0;                        // Guard B              : Disabled
00524     #endif
00525     AADGRDbits.GRDPOL   = 0;                        // Guard Polarity       : Start low
00526     
00527     AADCAP              = 0x00;         // Tuned for individual sensors during initialization
00528 }
00529 
00530 #endif
mTouch Framework v2.3 documentation by
